channel.title: When & Where do you make songs?
channel.description: Hey guys! Just wanted to see When and where ( as the title suggests ) do you make your songs!

item.title: When & Where do you make songs?
item.dc:creator: TXA
item.description:
Usually at home. On my comfy couch

item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
It’s not uncommon for me to stay up until 4am making music and then accidentally press the home button and realize that it’s 4am

item.title: When & Where do you make songs?
item.dc:creator: DontPartyWithGuns
item.description:
When I’m chilling out before I go to bed so I can vent out all my ideas.

item.source: When & Where do you make songs?

item.title: When & Where do you make songs?
item.dc:creator: MrSerpent
item.description:
I make a lot of songs at school but they’re the crappy ones I don’t share

The best music I make is in the middle of the day on weekends and holidays (that’s when I made Are You Still There?) and late at night on schoolnights (that’s when I made Go Back To Sleep)

I love to compose wherever and whenever but I can definitely vouch for the fact that there are certain times and places where people compose better than they usually do

Read full topic
item.source: When & Where do you make songs?

item.title: When & Where do you make songs?
item.dc:creator: BlaMeese
item.description:
Sometimes I make them during math class.
Most of the time I make them super late at night or early in the morning because that’s when I get inspiration.

item.title: When & Where do you make songs?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
When I’m in a car, on a plane, on a ferry or on my bed in the morning and I’m waking up. I find listening to a song that I made the previous day helpful because since I have just woken up I’m listening to it with fresh ears.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: When & Where do you make songs?
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
I don’t have a schedule for when I work on a track. I’ll usually hear something that’ll give me some kind of inspiration for another loop or melody I can use and I’ll run with it.
